item.title: Get to Know More
item.description: I'm Sowndarya Krishnan(pronounced: Sown-dar-yeh Krish-nun) — short name: Krish or Chris, currently pursuing a Master’s Thesis in Computer Science at the Colorado School of Mines.

item.title: My Gallery
item.description: Welcome to my gallery! Here you’ll find some of my favorite landscapes, each capturing a unique and serene moment in nature.

item.title: Updates
item.description: 🏆 Won the Best Poster Presentation Award at the CMAPP Honors Event for delivering the best pitch and presenting the best poster. 🧑‍⚖️ Served as a Judge in “Undergraduate Research Symposium” in Sept 2024 🎯 Planning to propose my MS thesis in Spring 2025 and graduate in May 2025. 🔍 Contributed to the Brickschema Ontology project in June 2024. 🛠 Started contributing to the Sloan Project as a Frontend Developer in May 2024. 🛠 Started contributing to the Sloan Project as a Backend Engineer in Jan 2024. 🔬 Began working as a Research Assistant at Data-Driven CPS Lab in August 2023. 📚 Started my MS thesis in Computer Science at Colorado School of Mines in August 2023. 👩‍💻 Joined NCOMPASS TECH STUDIO as a Mobile and Cloud Engineer in May 2022. 🎓 Got my B.E. in Electronics & Communication Engineering from Anna University in 2022.

item.title: Know Your Worth: The Value of Changing Your Environment
item.description: A thoughtful analogy on how our value depends on the environment we are in and how to avoid settling for less.

item.title: Ask 'Em Out
